2109720.description:
Roam Survival


Survive and Repair Your Plane on a Danger-Filled Island!

In Roam Survival, your plane has crashed on a remote island full of mysteries and threats. As Sam, a plane mechanic, your mission is to survive in this hostile environment while seeking the resources needed to repair your aircraft and escape this terrifying place.

Key Features:

Extensive Exploration: Explore a vast open world filled with unique details, from dense jungles to ancient ruins, every corner of the island is packed with secrets and surprises.

Resource Management: Collect and manage vital resources for your survival. Build shelters, craft tools, and keep your basic needs covered while facing the island's challenges.

Intense Combat: Face a variety of enemies, from wild creatures to hostile tribes. Develop strategies to overcome dangers and protect yourself as you explore.

Construction and Customization: Design and upgrade your shelter and gear. Use the resources you find to build structures, create useful items, and personalize your island life.

Graphical and Audio Immersion: Immerse yourself in a vibrant environment with detailed graphics and an immersive soundtrack that further enhances the survival experience.

Are you ready to face the island's challenges and repair your plane? Adventure and survival await you in Roam Survival!
